AttributionCategoryVS ValueSet

Whether the adverse event is attributed to a treatment, course of the disease, medical error, unrelated to either, or unknown.

description: Whether the adverse event is attributed to a treatment, course of the disease, medical error, unrelated to either, or unknown.

concept.display: Adverse event is attributed to an intervention or treatment.
Adverse event is attributed to the course of the disease
Adverse event is attributed to a medical error 98240004 | Medication error (event)
Adverse event is attributed to an cause unrelated to the treatment, disease, or medical error.  262241003 | Unrelated (finding)
The causal category of the adverse event is unknown 261665006 | Unknown
